name: Punk Island
description:
Punk Island - GMTK Game Jam 2022

"Roll of the Dice" - Are you feelin' lucky, punk?

How to Play

Drive the boat around to destroy objects and get pickups!

  • W: Forward
  • S: Reverse
  • A: Turn Left
  • D: Turn Right
  • P: Pause
  • R: Reset Vehicle
  • Mouse: Camera Look
  • Spacebar:  YELL!!!

Powerups:

  2x multiplier

   1/2x multiplier

   Infrared mode

    Extra time

  Score increase (100 per face)

  Score decrease (20 per face)

Targets:

Barrel - 20 points

Chair - 30 points

Crate - 20 points

Donut - 50 points

Fish - 100 points

Portaloo - 75 points

Sailboat - 60 points

Traffic Cone - 40 points

Water Tank - 35

Developers

  • Nick McEvoy (Project wrangler)
  • Chris Targett (Guru master teacher)
  • Rachael "Not Related" McEvoy (Whip cracker)
  • Jarred McEvoy (Main game mechanic)
  • Philippe "Phiippee" Rzetelski (Sound dude)
  • Lisa Neldner (Island guru)
  • Clayton Locke (Physics master)
